Experience.summary: I have worked on Front end Development (Creating SPA using Angular JS & Bootstrap framework).I Created Automation Scripts which help in decrease the human load & increase productivity. I was responsible for the Quality Assurance for the deliverables.

Project1.Description: CIO-08 is a Finance outsourcing project, where all the business deals are evaluated with the help of a excel based tool DATA, which is based on Dot Net
Project1.Responsibilities1: Developing rich responsive user Interface websites on designed and behavior specs.
Project1.Responsibilities2: Develop application using Angular JS to implement Single Page Architecture(SPA).
Project1.Responsibilities3: Used angular to consume restful services.
Project1.Responsibilities4: Used Angular JS to consume Restful Services using SQL DB.
Project1.Responsibilities5: Created a modular design using Ui-routers.

Project2.Description: Costing & Pricing Engine is a tool used for getting client data & providing a estimate for any particular deal.
Project2.Responsibilities1: Automation of Costing module on UFT.
Project2.Responsibilities2: Automation of CVR module in javascript.
Project2.Responsibilities4: Participating in walkthroughs with developers, analysts and business users.
Project2.Responsibilities5: Upload all the deliverables and reference documents on the Shared folder for onshore reference.

Project3.Description: Costing & Pricing Engine is a tool used for getting client data & providing a estimate for any particular deal.
Project3.Responsibilities1: Developing rich responsive user Interface websites on designed and behavior specs.
Project3.Responsibilities2: Develop application using Angular JS to implement Single Page Architecture(SPA).
Project3.Responsibilities3: Used angular to consume restful services.
Project3.Responsibilities4: Worked on Angular js (creating controllers & custom directives).
Project3.Responsibilities5: Created a modular design using Ui-routers.
